name: Corporate Partnership Dynamics
description: This theory explains how technology companies form strategic partnerships to develop innovative projects in specific domains.

hypotheses.statement: Companies with complementary expertise are more likely to form successful partnerships.

evidence.description: Acme Corporation (software) partnered with Global Systems Ltd. (systems integration) on Project Alpha.

hypotheses.statement: Leadership roles significantly influence the direction of partnership projects.

evidence.description: Both CEOs were involved in the announcement of Project Alpha.
The CTO's technical background aligns with the AI focus of the project.

name: AI Application in Industry Verticals
description: This theory explores how AI solutions are tailored to specific industry verticals, particularly healthcare.

hypotheses.statement: Healthcare is a priority vertical for AI applications due to potential impact.

evidence.description: Project Alpha specifically focuses on AI solutions for healthcare.
